description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Bud Siddhisena - Lead Software Engineer at Enova

ABSTRACT
Docker and containerization is all the hype these days. But as a developer, why would you use Docker over any other virtualization technology? In this talk, developers will learn Docker [...]
